name: Piwik Analytics
description: Automatically add Piwik tracking code to any theme.

tracking_url.label: Piwik URL
tracking_url.info: You can find your tracking url by logging into Piwik, clicking Settings, then selecting the Websites tab and Get Tracking code. Important: No protocoll (http[s]://) and no trailing slash! (example.com/piwik)

site_id.label: Site ID
site_id.info: You can find your Site ID by searching for ?idsite= in your tracking code.

validation.error_message: Not a valid Site ID. Only Integers allowed.
